element-citation.article-title: Effect of amylose content on gelatinization, retrogradation and pasting properties of starches from waxy and non-waxy wheat and their F1 seeds

ref.mixed-citation: Sasaki T, Yasui T, Matsuki (2000) Effect of amylose content on gelatinization, retrogradation and pasting properties of starches from waxy and non-waxy wheat and their F1 seeds. Cereal Chemistry 77: 58-63.
